name: Life Arcade
description:
Life Arcade is a simple but challenging game where you have to take all the collectables in each stage, but you have to remember that whatever you do is going to be used against you in the following stages: your movement is recorded and the obstacles are going to move like you did before, so, watch out!

INSTRUCTIONS

  • Move with arrow keys
  • Escape to quit game

Programming and design by Nicolás Recabarren.

Music and sfxs by Tomás Batista.

GAME MADE FOR TRAIN JAM 2017
